name: Snorlax
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: This glutton appears in villages without warning and devours the entirety of their rice granaries—such occurrences have long been counted among the gravest of disasters.

abilities.name: Unfazed Fat
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon done to this Pokémon. (Damage is not an effect.)

attacks.name: Thumping Snore
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep. During Pokémon Checkup, flip 2 coins instead of 1. If either of them is tails, this Pokémon is still Asleep.
